Name: Srikandi
Review Text:
Hospitality is impeccable, the food tastes authentic, they've good ambiance too.
Though I had some confusion about the number of dishes as part of Rihsttafel! Although it's my fault as they did explain the names of all the dishes.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Amazing food! Very sweet staff, flavorful dishes, vegetarian friendly too!

Name: Srikandi
Review Text:
Awful experience!! I went to this restaurants with some friends to enjoy a night of indonesian cuisine, and what we received was the complete opposite.
After a long waiting time, when our food finally arrived we notice that our …

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Very good place to have some Asian food around the city. Tye ambience of the place is very nice and quiet. There are a lot of dishes to select, but almost no chicken options. Most of the dishes are for multiple people, and only a few ones …

Name: Srikandi
Srikandi
Review Text: One of my favorite places in the city, really flavorful and tasty Indonesian food. One of the best I've had! Tip: get the rice table which is like a tasting menu with many different small dishes. Especially the peanut sauce is amazing :)

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Good food, friendly service and attentive, but not overbearing staff. All in all, a certainty that we'll be back next trip to Amsterdam. Building looks a little shabby from outside, but the food more than makes up for that.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: We ordered chicken satay and lupia as appetizers. The peanut sauce was the most flavorful I've ever had. For main courses we ordered a salty beef sauce, a duck dish and a coconut rice with a sample of a few items (in the attaches photo). …

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: - Good food - Good location - waiters were very nice but clumsy

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Fantastic find! Lovely food and lovely staff - I meant to take photos but each time our food arrived it was so good we just dove straight in. We had a starter and a main each but a lot of other tables seemed to have a set menu special - …

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: We came as a large group without any dinner reservations having both vegetarian and gluten-free needs and they accommodated us beautifully. Our server and his service was delightful. The food was abundant and plentiful. Everyone said it was …

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Went there two times during our trip to Amsterdam because everything there was so good. First time was on a whim because we had booked a canal trip right next to it. The food was awesome, the waiter was nice, decorations looked good, and food was plenty.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: We chose this restaurant after another nearby Indonesian restaurant was reservation only. We ended up finding this restaurant and got a rice plate. The food was absolutely amazing, with a great variety of tastes and spices of all kinds. The …

Review Text:

Upon reading some good reviews, my family and I (including a 3 year old) decided …

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Great food, kind and friendly hosts. We were a party of 10 and asked them to suggest a menu for us and they did great. Food was a little extra but all delicious. Call out for the beef pandang curry and chicken satay. Great place!

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Great indonesian food. Relatively small restaurant with very tasty and well balanced food. Good variety in flavours. Food came quick and staff is nice. Can absolutely recommend this place.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Had a Srikandi Rijsttaffel with my family. They made sure some of the dishes were suitable for the child as well. …

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Food was good, we had the 2nd from the last Rice Table.  I wouldn't say it was spectacular, but decent. I've has better Indonesian food in LA. It's an interesting way to serve Indonesian food, kind of in a Spanish Tapas way, you get to …

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Great and personalized service! We tried the menu with 10 different small plates and the food was amazing! Also great options for vegetarians. Would highly recommend this resturant and definietly come back next time I am in Amsterdam!

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Useless place. The waiters are pushy. I ordered one thing and received another when I asked them to make the one I ordered they complained that it will a waste of food. Also I told them about my wife's allergies. Which they completely …

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: The food was nice and flavoursome and the service impeccable but they are more expensive than their competitors. 20 years ago it must have been a great place but today it is a bit dusty and old. The windows are so dirty you can't see through, which means the room was almost empty when we went. Could do better.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Amazing food and service. Fish and rice were delicious and kept coming. The warm peanut sauce was terrific 👌:)))

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: We were on our way to the Paradiso they seated us right away. The food was very tasty and and was served quickly. We had the Srikandi rijsttafel.  Which was perfect for two.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Im from Malaysia and was on a Euro Trip last January 2018. Had the opportunity to have my dinner here, two thumbs up for the food. Really authentic taste just like in Malaysia or Indonesia.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: The service is impeccable, the food is tasty and the ambience is traditional yet intimate. If you do enjoy some kick, try the Ikan Bakar Jimbaran  which is a dorade marinated in spicy balinese sauce and grilled in banana leaves , or the Gastronomic Rijsttafel

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: We had 2 different duck dishes, and they were both excellent.  Very friendly service.  Good selection of wine.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Had great meal. Good size portions and good quality. Friendly staff. Steps very high so difficult entry.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Service is very slow as it seems understaffed. Food is average. There are much much better Indonesian restaurant in this area.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Excellent food and service. We had the gourmet selection and it was amazing. Thoroughly recommended.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: The food is overpriced and the quality is poor.  We ordered 2 dishes, a chicken dish and a noodles dish and it looked like it was reheated in a microwave.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: very many menu options with a good explanation of how they taste, very nice hardworking staff, good art and awesome food

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Tasty and authentic Indonesian good, and in a much calmer atmosphere than the better known place nearby.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Restaurant that provides Indonesian food, quite similar like from the origin. But the restaurant needs more space, it was so small.

Name: Srikandi
Review Text: Great Indonesian food really good service. Love the various tastes

Review Text: Great food and great service! Both starters and mains were equally delicious :)
